item.description:
IMPORTANT EVENT INFORMATION UPDATE:On line ticket sales close at 3:00 P.M. today. There will be plenty of tickets available at the entrance to the Red Sox Natives reserved section at the event. Scoreboard will be busy. Please arrive early if you can in order to avoid any lines later in the evening since the band is popular.  All are welcome. Bring guests, friends and fans. Additional raffle tickets will be available for purchase during the event. I just wrote Mindy a check for $60.00 worth of raffle tickets.  Mindy is still looking for a few more volunteers to sell raffle tickets at the event. You do not need to be present to win the raffle prizes which include a pair of Red Sox/Yankees tickets, a pair of Boston Uncorked 7th Anniversary Wine Tasting Party tickets, wine, scratch tickets...and any other items that Natives donate. We look forward to seeing you at Scoreboard tonight.

 

***This event has been announced to 8 groups. Please update your RSVPs. Raffle prizes have been added.***

The event is being sponsored by Lauren from our host Scoreboard, Coach Henry at Henrys Baseball Club and Jay from Boston Uncorked. The Natives thank you!

Last year over 50 people attended and had a blast so it's on for 2012! We already have over 60 RSVPs for this year.

By this time the demons of the 2011 Red Sox season will have been exorcised! 

Please join the Red Sox Natives for their Second Annual Spring Training Kick-Off at 6 pm on Saturday March 24 at Scoreboard Sports Bar and Grille in Woburn as we prepare for the 2012 Red Sox season and say goodbye to winter with live music from Spike The Punch. 

If you have never been to the newly renovated Scoreboard, it is located at 15 Middlesex Canal Park next to the Holiday Inn and Showcase Cinema off Route 128 in Woburn. Scoreboard has 18 High Definition and Plasma TVs ranging in size from 50 to 92 inches. More info at http://www.tpsscoreboard.com.

Join us if you are a Red Sox Native veteran, rookie, or organizer. Join us if you are a Red Sox and Baseball fan. Join us if you want to become a member of the Natives. Join us if you have something Baseball to promote. Join us if you are sick of winter and like the band Spike The Punch.

Think of the evening as a Doubleheader:

Game 1 begins at 6 pm. The Lineup includes:

Complimentary popcorn, wings and treats provided by Scoreboard.

There is a Cash Bar.

Natives will have our own Reserved Section to meet, mix and mingle.

Meet and Greet with the Red Sox Natives Founder, Co-Organizers and Assistant Organizers.

Meet Native Mindy Finkelstein who is representing the Natives in The May 20th Run-Walk To Home Base at Fenway Park (It's a 9K run or 5K walk). Funds raised support the Home Base Program which assists veterans returning home with traumatic brain injuries and post traumatic stress. 

http://www.runtohomebase.org/what-is-the-home-base-program. Complete details are on the Natives calendar.

Game 2 begins at 9:00 pm. The Lineup Includes:

Hang out for optional dinner, drinks, and dancing with live music provided by the band Spike The Punch. Natives and friends rave about this band when they appear at Scoreboard.

With a late afternoon Bruins game, March Madness, the popularity of the band and Scoreboard, I would expect the place to be PACKED after 8:00pm so please avoid any lines and arrive early.

Tickets for the event are $10.00 in advance on-line and include:

Access to our reserved section 

Some reserved seating 

Wings and Treats from ScoreBoard

TEN (10) raffle tickets for the Red Sox/Yankees tickets, a pair of tickets to Boston Uncorked 7th Anniversary Wine Tasting Party at Forum on April 11, a bottle of Mindy's special wine, red sox scratch tickets  and any other donated items. 

Please purchase your tickets on line in advance before the event. Scoreboard can only give us a limited amount of space. 

Mindy and a few Native Women will be collecting optional donations to support Mindy's $1,000.00 mandatory fundraising goal.

To donate online, the link to Mindy's fundraising page is: http://www.runtohomebase.org/runtohomebase/gomindy. 

A $15.00 optional on line donation (before March 21) or donation at the event gives you 5 tickets for our raffle. As an incentive each additional $5.00 donated gives you 5 more raffle tickets. Raffle drawing will take place at the event with some very special wine from Mindy's private collection, a pair of tickets to Boston Uncorked 7th Anniversary wine tasting event at Forum on April 11, red sox scratch tickets,  a pair of Red Sox Yankees Tickets for a September game and items to be added. (No need to be present). AND IF YOU DONATE WE WILL GET YOUR NAME ON THE GUEST LIST TO ENTER FENWAY PARK, CHEER FOR MINDY AND WALK THE WARNING TRACK AFTER THE MAY 20th RUN (at Red Sox discretion). 

Please remember to maintain your own food and bar tab and tip your servers. 

Join us early or later. Early is better to avoid lines and take advantage of the entire event. Wear your best Sox gear. Bring cool guests and friends.

 

See you on March 24!

 

Fenway Frank
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Scoreboard hostess to direct you to our section. All Natives are encouraged to wear Red Sox gear.
item.name: Red Sox Natives 2012 Spring Training Kickoff & Spike The Punch Band atScoreboard
